dmca.title: Chanel, Inc./Trademark counterfeiting by www.shoesoffer.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Main Email [mailto:stop-counterfeits@chanel-legal.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2007 4:40 PM
To: Abuse; Copyright
Cc: freddeng232@hotmail.com; root@shoesoffer.com; freddeng232@yahoo.com;
freddeng232@yahoo.com.cn
Subject: Chanel, Inc./Trademark counterfeiting by www.shoesoffer.com


THE PLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
ABUSE@THEPLANET.COM
1333 NORTH STEMMONS FREEWAY, SUITE 110
DALLAS, TEXAS 75207

     Re:    Chanel, Inc./Trademark Counterfeiting by
            www.shoesoffer.com

Dear Sir/Madam:

We represent Chanel, Inc. ("Chanel"), in certain intellectual property
matters.

Chanel is the owner of the world-famous CHANEL and CC Monogram
trademarks (the "Chanel Marks").  Chanel owns numerous trademark
registrations worldwide for the Chanel Marks.  These registrations
constitute conclusive evidence of our client's ownership of the Chanel
Marks as well as Chanel's exclusive right to use these marks.  As a
matter of law, these trademark registrations are constructive notice to
your company of Chanel's rights in the marks.

It has come to Chanel's attention that your company provides web-hosting
services to the website www.shoesoffer.com and electronic mail
("e-mail") services to root@shoesoffer.com which are offering for sale
counterfeit Chanel goods.  This correspondence shall constitute express
notice to you that www.shoesoffer.com is using Chanel's famous name and
trademarks to divert traffic to the website in violation of multiple
international criminal laws as well as civil laws regarding trademark
infringement, counterfeiting, and unfair competition.  Pursuant to these
laws, Chanel is entitled to extensive remedies, including preliminary
and permanent injunctions, recovery of profits, treble damages, and
attorney fees.  

Accordingly, Chanel requests your company cease providing web-hosting
services to the owner of the site that is accessed through the URL of
www.shoesoffer.com and 
e-mail services to root@shoesoffer.com.  Further, Chanel requests your
company's written confirmation within two weeks of the date of this
letter that it has removed or blocked access to the pages at
www.shoesoffer.com containing the Chanel name and marks and has ceased
providing e-mail services to root@shoesoffer.com.

We are authorized by Chanel to make this demand based upon its
good-faith belief that the above-identified website's use of the Chanel
name and marks is not authorized by Chanel, its agents, or the law.  

This demand is made without waiver of any of Chanel's rights or
remedies, all of which are expressly reserved.

Stephen M. Gaffigan, Esq.
Stephen M. Gaffigan, P.A.
312 S.E. 17th Street
Second Floor
Ft. Lauderdale, FL 33316
Attorney for Chanel, Inc.

954-767-4819 - Phone
954-767-4821 - Facsimile
Stop-counterfeits@Chanel-legal.com 




________________________________________________________________
Sent via the WebMail system at chanel-legal.com
dmca.principal_name: Stephen M. Gaffigan, P.A. (for Chanel, Inc.)
